casebody.data:
TRITEK TECHNOLOGIES, INC., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Appellee, and Northrop Grumman Corporation, Third Party Defendant-Appellee, and Seimens Dematic Corporation (now known as Siemens Energy & Automation, Inc.), Third-Party Defendant-Appellee. No. 2006-5014. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Nov. 13, 2006.

Before MAYER, BRYSON, and LINN, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM:

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is

ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
